tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyDistribution (
  zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  zone_name VARCHAR(255),
  power_schedule TEXT,
  demand_forecast DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ZoneSchedules (
  zone_schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  zone_id INT,
  schedule_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES PowerZones(zone_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES PowerSchedules(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AssignedSchedule (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_id INT NOT NULL,
    schedule_id INT NOT NULL,
    forecast_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES Zone(zone_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES PowerSchedule(schedule_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (forecast_id) REFERENCES DemandForecast(forecast_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Zone (zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY, zone_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, demand_forecast INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE PowerSchedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, schedule_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE ZonePowerSchedule (zone_id INT, schedule_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES Zone(zone_id), FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES PowerSchedule(schedule_id));
CREATE TABLE EnergyUsage (usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, zone_id INT, usage_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL, usage_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES Zone(zone_id));
CREATE TABLE DemandHistory (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, zone_id INT, demand_forecast INT NOT NULL, forecast_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES Zone(zone_id));
